title: Updates Update
notes: This 'updates overlay' is the new feature added in this update!
Whenever you see this, you know it's a new update
In the last update, I added 'Hard Mode' to the game
With that I'm starting Wild Wednesdays, where the daily game on Wednesdays will be a 'Hard Mode' game
If you don't like that and would prefer a normal game on Wednesdays, let me know at loganlarson@caffeinatedstudios.dev

title: Play Again Update
notes: Oh boy, it's been a while since the last update
--- A 'Play Again' button to the solved puzzle popup in Practice Mode
--- Slight visual changes to the solved puzzle popup
--- A refactoring of the updates overlay
--- An indicator to the new game screen for Wild Wednesday games
Also, I'm looking into why sometimes the Hard Mode games take a while to load

title: 'Try this puzzle' Update
notes: When you share a practice puzzle, the link will take the person to the puzzle you just played
So now you can directly challenge your friends to beat your time!
I also reduced the time it takes to load a Hard Mode game
Next update will be focused around an updated drag and drop system!
